channel.title: Having problems when player dies
channel.description:
I tried to change the cords to lumbridge and it worked but it's putting the player at the wrong cords I set it to, It's kind of like the cords are all shifted. I double checked and even picked new cords and it always puts the player in a different spot. Any idea what is causing this?
Thanks

item.title: Having problems when player dies
item.dc:creator: @zrickz zrickz
item.description:
@zrickz wrote:

ight say I put 3221 1221, it puts me at like 3221 1226
